1. **ğŸ“¤ One-click setup**: [Open a new Codespace](https://codespaces.new/azure-samples/openai-plugin-fastapi), giving you a fully configured cloud developer environment.
2. **ğŸª„ Make an API**: Add routes in `main.py`, done in a few minutes even without [FastAPI](https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/lo/tutorial/) experience, thanks to [GitHub Copilot](https://github.com/features/copilot/).
3. **â–¶ï¸ Run, one-click again**: Use VS Code's built-in *Run* command and open the forwarded port *8000* in your browser.
